'''Liyue''' is a soundtrack from the album ''[[Jade Moon Upon a Sea of Clouds]]''.

The first theme plays in [[Liyue Harbor]] during daytime; the second theme was featured in an animated cutscene from the [[Version 1.3]] event [[Lantern Rite]].

On December 19, 2021, this track was re-released in the [[Featured Original Soundtrack (2021)]], Genshin Impact's first OST album recorded with {{w|Dolby Atmos}} technology.<ref>Twitter: [https://twitter.com/genshinimpact/status/1472423184171343872 Featured Original Soundtrack Announcement]</ref>
